metadata.title: CVE-2021-38496 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: During operations on MessageTasks, a task may have been removed while itwas still scheduled, resulting in memory corruption and a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.15,Thunderbird < 91.2, Firefox ESR < 91.2, Firefox ESR < 78.15, and Firefox <93.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
